content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. So, let's discuss the price. What would you consider a fair amount for this prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 500 Euros per month would be a fair price. It's not too expensive for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 500 Euros per month is an interesting offer. It's certainly lower than what I was expecting. Can you justify why you think this is a fair price for this particular apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, the apartment is unfurnished and it's not that big, only 50 square meters. I think 500 Euros per month is a reasonable price for this kind of apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I see your point. However, the location is quite central, which usually commands a higher price. Let's say I'm willing to go to 600 Euros per month, considering the convenience of the location. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good offer, but I still think 550 Euros per month would be a more fair price. It's a nice apartment, but I don't think it's worth 600 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your perspective. If you're willing to settle for 550 Euros per month, I might be able to consider that. It's not my usual rate, but I'm willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to sign a longer lease term for this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are still not at the price I want. I would prefer to stick to 550 Euros per month without a longer lease term.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't agree to 550 Euros per month without a longer lease term. I'm willing to negotiate on the lease term if you're willing to meet me halfway on the price. How about 575 Euros per month with a one-year lease? That's the best I can offer without compromising on my terms.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [575] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Fantastic! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The lease term will be one year, and the monthly rent will be 575 Euros. Is there anything else we need to discuss regarding the rental terms?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
